export default function EventDetailPage({fight}) { return( <>

vs

{fight.fighter2.name}

{fight.fighter2.nickname}

{fight.fighter2.wins}-{fight.fighter2.losses} W-L

) } // <> //

fight matchup

// athlete 1: {fight.fighter1.name}
// athlete 2: {fight.fighter2.name} //
